name: Ghost Runner (dmcpacks)
description:
You are a person stuck in a mansion. avoid ghosts, collect keys, set records, and most impostantly, escape the mansion.
2D, 1 player can be played online or offline.

Controls:

w and up-move forward

s and down-move backwards

a and left- move left

d and right- move right

f-full screen

space bar-place bomb

left click chest-creates save file

left click purple cartridge-open save file

How to play:

Move around and collect keys (some levels don't have keys), blow up ghosts and white barriers with the bomb and reach the red X to go to the next room. Click chests to create save files (no reaction will happen, only click once), on the main menu when you open the game click the purple cartridge to open a save file.
